com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.factory

Interface ConnectionSettingsBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionSettingsBuilderImpl

    public interface ConnectionSettingsBuilder
    The ConnectionSettingsBuilder builds new ConnectionSettings. Use AcrolinxFactory.connectionSettings() to create a new instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionSettings build() 
      ConnectionSettingsBuilder withServerEndpointConfiguration(ServerEndpointConfiguration serverEndpointConfiguration) 
      ConnectionSettingsBuilder withSingleSignOnConfiguration(SingleSignOnConfiguration singleSignOnConfiguration) 
      ConnectionSettingsBuilder withUser(User user) 

    • Method Detail

      • build

        ConnectionSettings build()
        Returns:
        The new ConnectionSettings.

        ConnectionSettingsBuilder withServerEndpointConfiguration(ServerEndpointConfiguration serverEndpointConfiguration)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the ConnectionSettingsBuilder for chaining.

        ConnectionSettingsBuilder withUser(User user)
        Parameters:
